mapper.select: SELECT DRE_NUM, D_NUM, DRE_WRITER, DRE_CONTENT, DRE_DATE, DRE_MDATE, DRE_PARENTS, DRE_GROUP, UNIQUE_NUM, DRE_DELETE FROM DREPLY WHERE D_NUM = #{ dNum } ORDER BY DRE_NUM ASC, DRE_NUM ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DREPLY VALUES (DRE_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ dNum }, #{ dreWriter }, #{ dreContent }, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM DUAL), (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM DUAL), DRE_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ dNum }, #{ uniqueNum }, DEFAULT)

INSERT INTO DREPLY VALUES (DRE_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ dNum }, #{ dreWriter }, #{ dreContent }, (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM DUAL), (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM DUAL), #{ dreNum }, #{ dNum }, #{ uniqueNum }, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE DREPLY SET DRE_CONTENT = #{ dreContent }, DRE_MDATE = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM DUAL) WHERE DRE_NUM = ${ dreNum }
mapper.delete: UPDATE DREPLY SET DRE_DELETE = 'y', DRE_MDATE = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM DUAL) WHERE DRE_NUM = #{ dreNum }
